rukus.text: wawaʿadna musa thalathina laylatan wa-atmamnaha biʿashrin fatamma miqatu rabbihi arbaʿina laylatan waqala musa li-akhihi haruna ukh'luf'ni fi qawmi wa-aslih wala tattabiʿ sabila l-muf'sidina

walamma jaa musa limiqatina wakallamahu rabbuhu qala rabbi arini anzur ilayka qala lan tarani walakini unzur ila l-jabali fa-ini is'taqarra makanahu fasawfa tarani falamma tajalla rabbuhu lil'jabali jaʿalahu dakkan wakharra musa saʿiqan falamma afaqa qala sub'hanaka tub'tu ilayka wa-ana awwalu l-mu'minina
qala yamusa inni is'tafaytuka ʿala l-nasi birisalati wabikalami fakhudh ma ataytuka wakun mina l-shakirina
wakatabna lahu fi l-alwahi min kulli shayin mawʿizatan watafsilan likulli shayin fakhudh'ha biquwwatin wamur qawmaka yakhudhu bi-ahsaniha sa-urikum dara l-fasiqina

sa-asrifu ʿan ayatiya alladhina yatakabbaruna fi l-ardi bighayri l-haqi wa-in yaraw kulla ayatin la yu'minu biha wa-in yaraw sabila l-rush'di la yattakhidhuhu sabilan wa-in yaraw sabila l-ghayi yattakhidhuhu sabilan dhalika bi-annahum kadhabu biayatina wakanu ʿanha ghafilina
wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina waliqai l-akhirati habitat aʿmaluhum hal yuj'zawna illa ma kanu yaʿmaluna
